faqs.q: Why is the introductory session FREE?
faqs.a: The first session is meant to clarify fundamentals of service provisioning in today’s time. We made the decision of making it free so that only those who actually find it useful can make the choice of going further

faqs.q: Why is the entire series NOT FREE?
faqs.a: We have to spend a lot of resources in conducting just one workshop, so to keep the rollers running we need to charge for the series. This series runs in 3 locations and comprises of 4 more workshops

faqs.q: I am already working as a Real Estate Agent or Insurance Agent or a Travel Agent since long. How can this workshop help me?
faqs.a: Customers needs and competition are both pretty demanding currently. In order to uphold your current business as well as grow, you need to keep pace with changing and upcoming trends. This series is all about this same aspect and hence the need

faqs.q: Can I know more about the introductory session?
faqs.a: Neither in a website nor in a phone call can we completely drive the point home about the need for this series. That is why we urge you to attend this session instead for your own clarity.

faqs.q: I am a budding entrepreneur looking for a good break?
faqs.a: This workshop will be very good for you as you will be able better handle the customer which will increase your productivity from beginning of your career.

faqs.q: The venue is too far or it takes too long to reach you guys?
faqs.a: We have tried our best to host the workshops in different places, but sadly we can only go so far. if you wish to improve your productivity and want to understand what today’s buyer wants, you need to come once. Only then can you know, how you can be a better service provider & how you can be winner in the today’s competition
